meanings.definition: Large sandstone blocks used in prehistoric monuments.
meanings.sent1: The ancient builders lifted the heavy sarsens to construct the monument.
meanings.sent2: Visitors to Stonehenge marvel at the massive sarsens standing tall.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to hide its acorn stash under the sarsens.
meanings.sent4: The sarsens stood like silent guardians of the ancient site.
meanings.sent5: The sarsens gleamed in the sunlight, a testament to ancient craftsmanship.

meanings.definition: A type of rock formation commonly found in the Stonehenge area.
meanings.sent1: The unique sarsens in the landscape added to the mystical aura of the area.
meanings.sent2: Geologists study the composition of the sarsens to understand their origin.
meanings.sent3: The children pretended the sarsens were giant sleeping animals in their game.
meanings.sent4: The sarsens seemed to whisper ancient secrets to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The sarsens loomed like silent sentinels over the ancient landscape.
